1524480.name: The Poop On 2020 Podcast!
1524480.description:
Due to public demand from ONE PERSON, the developer commentary that's barely hidden in my game is now available for download for FREE!
That's right, it's the POOP ON 2020 PODCAST! You'll hear insights from solo developer, Mandel Lum, about his process on making the only game where you get to throw poop at 2020! He's joined by music composer, David Gonzalez, who managed make the greatest looping soundtrack ever known to grace your ear holes.

Download it today and experience the ecstasy of FAST FORWARDING through a game audio commentary that lasts almost 10 times longer than the game itself!
1524480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
